recipe.title: Grandmas Veggie Soup
recipe.comment: This one of my families favourites. Good to cook on a day you intent spending at home!
recipe.ingredient: 2 lamb shanks or other lamb bones
recipe.step: Place all ingredients in a large pot and cover with stock until it is up to your thumb joint over all ingredients. Bring to the boil, then reduce to a simmer. Remove scum from the top and cook until the meat is falling of the bone (about 4-6 hours.) Remove shanks and shred meat with knife and fork. Place all back into the pot, including the bones. Cook until soup thickens, usually another 1-2 hours. Remove bones and season with Salt and Pepper. Serve with crusty bread. You can freeze the soup or cook in slow cooker on low for 8-10 hours.
